elements.expression:
filters
| essql query="SELECT * FROM \"world-covid*\""
| math "last(cases)"
| metric "CASOS NO MUNDO" 
  metricFont={font size=48 family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" color="#000000" align="center" lHeight=48} 
  labelFont={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="center" color="#000000" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render containerStyle={containerStyle overflow="hidden"}

filters
| essql query="SELECT * FROM \"world-covid*\""
| math "last(deaths)"
| metric "MORTES NO MUNDO" 
  metricFont={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=48 align="center" color="#e74b8b" weight="bold" underline=false italic=false} 
  labelFont={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="center" color="#000000" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render containerStyle={containerStyle overflow="hidden"}

filters
| essql query="SELECT * FROM \"world-covid*\""
| math "last(recovered)"
| metric "RECUPERADOS NO MUNDO" 
  metricFont={font size=48 family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" color="#000000" align="center" lHeight=48} 
  labelFont={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=14 align="center" color="#000000" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} metricFormat="0,0.[000]"
| render containerStyle={containerStyle overflow="hidden"}
shape "square" fill="#4cbce4" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false | render
shape "square" fill="#4cbce4" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false | render
shape "square" fill="#4cbce4" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false | render
shape "square" fill="#4cbce4" border="rgba(255,255,255,0)" borderWidth=0 maintainAspect=false | render
